messages.content: As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: I will derive this data from the following paragraph: CASE NAME: The Whispering Willows Case DATE: 05/05/54 The courtroom was steeped in somber anticipation as the trial proceeded. The prosecution beckoned the officers key to the investigation to the stand. LAW ENFORCEMENT TESTIMONY: PROSECUTOR: Please state your name and role in the investigation. WITNESS: I am Captain A. B. Anderson, the head investigator of this case. PROSECUTOR: Thank you, Captain Anderson. Can you walk us through the events of the night the crime was discovered? WITNESS: Of course. On the night of November 11th, Officer C. D. Baker observed unusual movement in the Whispering Willows area and reported it. Our team initiated an investigation immediately. PROSECUTOR: Who was responsible for the forensic examination? WITNESS: Sergeant E. F. Clark and Technician G. H. Davis handled the forensic analysis. PROSECUTOR: Who carried out the interrogations? WITNESS: Detectives I. J. Evans and K. L. Foster were assigned to interrogate the suspects and potential witnesses. PROSECUTOR: Thank you. No further questions. The Defense took the opportunity to cross-examine Captain Anderson regarding the investigative techniques employed. During the trial, Patrol Officers M. N. Green, O. P. Harris, and Q. R. Ingram were also called to testify.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Captain A. B. Anderson 
Officer Context: Captain Anderson is the head investigator of the Whispering Willows Case, recounting the events on the night the crime was discovered during the trial. 
Officer Role: Captain 

Officer Name: Officer C. D. Baker 
Officer Context: Officer Baker observed unusual activity in the Whispering Willows area on the night of November 11th, which led to the initiation of the investigation. 
Officer Role: Officer 

Officer Name: Sergeant E. F. Clark 
Officer Context: Sergeant Clark, along with Technician G. H. Davis, was responsible for conducting the forensic examination related to the case. 
Officer Role: Sergeant 

Officer Name: Technician G. H. Davis 
Officer Context: Technician Davis worked alongside Sergeant E. F. Clark to handle the forensic analysis concerning the crime scene. 
Officer Role: Technician 

Officer Name: Detective I. J. Evans 
Officer Context: Detective Evans, paired with Detective K. L. Foster, was tasked with interrogating the suspects and potential witnesses to gather more information regarding the crime. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Detective K. L. Foster 
Officer Context: Detective Foster, alongside Detective I. J. Evans, conducted interrogations to collect additional information about the incident. 
Officer Role: Detective 

Officer Name: Patrol Officers M. N. Green, O. P. Harris, and Q. R. Ingram 
Officer Context: These Patrol Officers were summoned to testify during the trial, although their specific roles in the investigation were not detailed in the transcript. 
Officer Role: Patrol Officers
